name: CKRecordZone.ID
desc: An object that uniquely identifies a record zone in a database.

items.name: init(zoneName: String, ownerName: String)
items.desc: Creates a record zone ID with the specified name and owner.

items.name: var zoneName: String
items.desc: The unique name of the record zone.

items.name: var ownerName: String
items.desc: The ID of the user who owns the record zone.

items.name: static let defaultZoneName: String
items.desc: The name of the default zone.
